entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:48 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 95 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
